trans-unit.source: Set syspurpose attributes in file /etc/rhsm/syspurpose/syspurpose.json and synchronize these attributes with RHSM server. Syspurpose attributes help attach the most appropriate subscriptions to the system automatically. When syspurpose.json file already contains some attributes, then new attributes overwrite existing attributes. When some attribute is not listed in the new list of attributes, the existing attribute will be removed from syspurpose.json file. Unknown attributes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在文件 /etc/rhsm/syspurpose/syspurpose.json 中设置syspurpose属性，并将这些属性与RHSM服务器同步。Syspurpose属性有助于将最合适的订阅自动附加到系统。当 syspurpose.json 文件已经包含一些属性时，新属性将覆盖现有属性。当新的属性列表中未列出某些属性时，现有属性将从 syspurpose.json 文件中删除。未知属性将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Set variables in inventory that deal with geography or behavior. Since groups are frequently the entity that maps roles onto hosts, you can often set variables on the group instead of defining them on a role. Remember: child groups override parent groups, and host variables override group variables. See Defining variables in inventory for details on setting host and group variables.
trans-unit.target: 在清单中设置处理地理或行为的变量。由于组通常是将角色映射到主机的实体，因此您通常可以在组上设置变量，而不用在角色上定义它们。请记住：子组将覆盖父组，而主机变量将覆盖组变量。有关设置主机和组变量的详细信息，请参见在清单中定义变量。

trans-unit.source: Set variables in roles to ensure a value is used in that role, and is not overridden by inventory variables. If you are not sharing your role with others, you can define app-specific behaviors like ports this way, in roles/x/vars/main.yml. If you are sharing roles with others, putting variables here makes them harder to override, although they still can by passing a parameter to the role or setting a variable with -e:
trans-unit.target: 在角色中设置变量，以确保在该角色中使用了值，并且不会被清单变量覆盖。如果您不与其他人共享角色，则可以在 roles/x/vars/main.yml 定义特定于应用程序的行为，例如端口。如果您要与其他人共享角色，则在此处放置变量会使它们更难以覆盖，尽管它们仍然可以通过将参数传递给角色或使用 -e 设置变量来实现：

trans-unit.source: Sets the scope of the operation to network elements assigned to a Maintenance Region (MR) Value can be set as MR IDs including the Maintenance Region Collection (MRC) information (for example MRC-FIN1/MR-Hel). trans-unit.source: Several network platforms support privilege escalation, where certain tasks must be done by a privileged user. On network devices this is called enable mode (the equivalent of sudo in *nix administration). Ansible network modules offer privilege escalation for those network devices that support it. For details of which platforms support enable mode, with examples of how to use it, see the platform-specific documentation.
trans-unit.target: 一些网络平台支持特权升级，其中某些任务必须由特权用户完成。在网络设备上，这称为 enable 模式（相当于* nix管理中的 sudo ）。Ansible网络模块为支持它的那些网络设备提供特权升级。有关哪些平台支持 enable 模式的详细信息以及使用方式的示例，请参阅特定于平台的文档。

trans-unit.source: Several network platforms support privilege escalation, where certain tasks must be done by a privileged user. On network devices this is called the enable mode (the equivalent of sudo in *nix administration). Ansible network modules offer privilege escalation for those network devices that support it. For details of which platforms support enable mode, with examples of how to use it, see the platform-specific documentation.
trans-unit.target: Several network platforms support privilege escalation, where certain tasks must be done by a privileged user. On network devices this is called the enable mode (the equivalent of sudo in *nix administration). Ansible network modules offer privilege escalation for those network devices that support it. For details of which platforms support enable mode, with examples of how to use it, see the platform-specific documentation.

trans-unit.source: Several play-level keyword also affect play execution. The most common one is serial, which sets a number, a percentage, or a list of numbers of hosts you want to manage at a time. Setting serial with any strategy directs Ansible to ‘batch’ the hosts, completing the play on the specified number or percentage of hosts before starting the next ‘batch’. This is especially useful for rolling updates.
trans-unit.target: 几个播放级别关键字也影响播放执行。最常见的是 serial ，它设置一次要管理的主机的数量，百分比或数量列表。使用任何策略设置 serial 都将指示Ansible对主机进行“分批”，在开始下一个“分批”之前，在指定数量或百分比的主机上完成播放。这对于滚动更新特别有用。

trans-unit.source: Should the resource be present or absent. If state is replace and the key exists but has different content, delete it and recreate it with the new content.
trans-unit.target: 该资源是应该存在还是不存在。如果状态为替换,而密钥存在,但内容不同,则删除它,用新的内容重新创建。

trans-unit.source: Should the role be present/absent.
trans-unit.target: 角色是否应该存在/不存在。

trans-unit.source: Should the roles be present or absent on the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户身上的角色是存在还是不存在。

trans-unit.source: Should the schedule recur?
trans-unit.target: 时间表是否应该重复出现?

trans-unit.source: Should the setup tasks be included in the final report
trans-unit.target: 设置任务是否应包括在最后报告中?

trans-unit.source: Should the ssh-keygen use a CA key residing in a ssh-agent.
trans-unit.target: ssh-keygen是否应该使用驻留在ssh-agent中的CA密钥。

trans-unit.source: Should the step be present/absent/failed.
trans-unit.target: 该步骤是否应该存在/缺席/失败。

trans-unit.source: Should the storage connection be present or absent.
trans-unit.target: 如果存储连接存在或不存在。

trans-unit.source: Should the storage domain be present/absent/maintenance/unattached/imported/update_ovf_store
trans-unit.target: 存储域是否应该存在/缺席/维护/未连接/导入/更新_ovf_store。

trans-unit.source: Should the subjectAltName extension be considered as critical.
trans-unit.target: 是否应将subjectAltName的扩展视为关键。

trans-unit.source: Should the tag be present/absent/attached/detached.
trans-unit.target: 标签是否存在/不存在/附属/脱离。

trans-unit.source: Should the template be present/absent/exported/imported/registered. When state is registered and the unregistered template's name belongs to an already registered in engine template in the same DC then we fail to register the unregistered template.
trans-unit.target: 模板是否存在/不存在/导出/导入/注册。当 state 已注册且未注册模板的名称属于同一DC中已在引擎模板中注册的名称时，我们将无法注册未注册模板。

trans-unit.source: Should the user be present or absent in the group
trans-unit.target: 如果该用户在该组中出现或不在该组中出现

trans-unit.source: Should the user be present/absent.
trans-unit.target: 用户是否应该在场/不在场。

trans-unit.source: Should the vNIC be absent/present.
trans-unit.target: 如果vNIC不在/在场。

trans-unit.source: Should the volume provide 512-byte sector emulation?
trans-unit.target: 该卷是否应提供512字节扇区仿真?

trans-unit.source: Should this configuration be applied immediately, if set as permanent.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为永久,是否应立即应用此配置。

trans-unit.source: Should this configuration be in the running firewalld configuration or persist across reboots.
trans-unit.target: 这个配置应该是在运行中的firewalld配置中,还是在重启后持续存在。

trans-unit.source: Should this interface be managed via DHCP and DNS smart proxy and should it be configured during provisioning?
trans-unit.target: 这个接口是否应该通过DHCP和DNS智能代理进行管理,是否应该在配置时进行配置?

trans-unit.source: Should this interface be used for TFTP of PXELinux (or SSH for image-based hosts)?
trans-unit.target: 这个接口是否应该用于PXELinux的TFTP(或基于镜像的主机的SSH)?

trans-unit.source: Should this interface be used for constructing the FQDN of the host?
trans-unit.target: 这个接口是否应该用于构造主机的FQDN?

trans-unit.source: Should this managed policy be present or absent. Set to absent to detach all entities from this policy and remove it if found.
trans-unit.target: 该受管策略应存在或不存在。设置为不存在,则将所有实体从该策略中分离出来,并在发现时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: Should this rule be added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 这条规则是否应该增加或删除。

trans-unit.source: Should use authorize for net type.
trans-unit.target: 网络类型应使用授权。

trans-unit.source: Should we wait for the task to complete before moving onto the next.
trans-unit.target: 我们是否应该等任务完成后再进入下一个任务。

trans-unit.source: Should you develop a module?
trans-unit.target: 你要不要开发一个模块?

trans-unit.source: Should you feel the need to test for existence of files that are not declaratively set by your Ansible configuration, the ‘stat’ module is a great choice:
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要测试是否存在Ansible配置未声明设置的文件，则“ stat”模块是一个不错的选择：

trans-unit.source: Should you have a question rather than a bug report, inquiries are welcome on the ansible-project Google group or on Ansible’s “#ansible” channel, located on irc.freenode.net.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有问题而不是错误报告，欢迎通过ansible-project Google小组或irc.freenode.net上Ansible的“ #ansible”频道进行查询。

trans-unit.source: Should you want to invert the architecture of Ansible, so that nodes check in to a central location, instead of pushing configuration out to them, you can.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想颠覆Ansible的架构,让节点检查到一个中心位置,而不是将配置推送出去,你可以这样做。

trans-unit.source: Should you wish to change your password on a vault-encrypted file or files, you can do so with the rekey command:
trans-unit.target: 如果您想更改一个或多个金库加密文件的密码,您可以使用重钥命令进行更改。

trans-unit.target: 显示互联网服务应用。

trans-unit.target: 显示已发布的会议列表。

trans-unit.target: 在一定的条件下,以一定的显示值显示细节。
